name: bookmark-extension
description: Bookmark with full text search of bookmarked pages.

scripts.build: parcel build src/background.js src/main.js src/popup.html src/popup.js src/icon.png; cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json;
scripts.watch: watchman watch src; watchman -- trigger src build-extension -- yarn build
scripts.watch-broken: parcel watch src/main.js src/popup.html src/popup.js src/icon.png

author: Eric Fredine
